Title: Prof. Dr.
Name: Col. Mohammed Mosleh Uddin
Bio: Col. Mohammed Mosleh Uddin is a 57 years old Hematologist from Dhaka. He has overall 31+ years of experience in medical practices. He is a popular Hematology Oncologist and Bone Marrow Transplant Physician. Col. Mohammed Mosleh Uddin is currently working in Islami Bank Hospital, Mirpur, Dhaka as a Senior Hematologist. He worked as a Hematologist at Armed Forces Institution of Pathology for 12+ years and Hematologist at CMH Chittagong for 4+ years. Col. Mohammed Mosleh Uddin completed his Bachelor of Medicine and Bachelor of Surgery degree from Chittagong Medical College in 1991. He has also done Membership of the College of Bangladesh and Surgeons from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons in 1997, Fellow of the college of physicians & surgeons from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons in 2003 and DCP from Dhaka University in 1997. Col. Mohammed Mosleh Uddin is a well-known doctor for providing treatments like Stem Cell Transplantation and Hemato Oncology.
